scripts.build:all: npm run check:all && npm run build:web && npm run build:service
scripts.build:web: npm run check:all && vite build -c vite.config/production.js
scripts.check:all: npm run clear:gen && npm run gen:db-zod && npm run gen:list && npm run gen:type && npm run check:format && npm run check:lint && npm run check:type
scripts.db:push:dev: dotenv -e ./.env/.env.development -- prisma migrate dev && npm run gen:db-zod
scripts.db:push:prod: dotenv -e ./.env/.env.production -- prisma migrate deploy && npm run gen:db-zod
scripts.db:push:test: dotenv -e ./.env/.env.test -- prisma migrate dev && npm run gen:db-zod
scripts.gen:list:watch: cross-env DEBUG=@lsby:* tsx script/gen/watch.ts ./src/ "npm run gen:list"
scripts.gen:type:watch: cross-env DEBUG=@lsby:* tsx script/gen/watch.ts ./src/ "npm run gen:type"
scripts.pub:public: npm run check:all && npm run build:all && bumpp && npm publish --access public
scripts.run:dev:service: npm run gen:list && cross-env ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env/.env.development DEBUG=@lsby:*,playground-ts-service:* tsx --watch ./src/index.ts
scripts.run:prod: npm run gen:list && cross-env ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env/.env.production DEBUG=@lsby:*,playground-ts-service:* tsx ./src/index.ts
scripts.test:unit: npm run check:all && cross-env ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env/.env.test DEBUG=@lsby:*,playground-ts-service:* tsx script/test/run-test.ts
scripts.test:unit:coverage: npm run check:all && cross-env ENV_FILE_PATH=./.env/.env.test DEBUG=@lsby:*,playground-ts-service:* tsx script/test/run-test-coverage.ts && open-cli ./coverage/index.html
